hanzi-su-wiki:
勧

Значения

Рекомендовать, предлагать, угощать

Мнемоника

Сокращено. Справа — цапля, птица 隹 с шишечками на голове. Высиживает птенцов, не жалея сил 力. Следовать примеру цапли — рекомендовать.

Варианты

勸, 劝
purpleculture_pinyin:
quàn
Japanese variant of 劝
Японский вариант убеждения
rtega_mnemonic:
勸勸RS
劝劝		勧recommend, persuade, advise, urge
  • someone noisy 雚 with strong arms 力: persuasive person
  • ⓢ persuasion of a hand 又 with strength 力
heisig_constituent: persuade, pegasus, horse, pantomime horse, noon, sign of the horse, turkey, power, muscle, arnold
koohiiStory1: Mnemonic "pegasus persuasion power". I think of the hippogriff from Harry Potter as being like a pegasus. To befriend a hippogriff, you have to persuade it you mean no harm, you can do this if you have "pegasus persuasion power".
koohiiStory2: It would take a powerful argument to persuade me Pegasus was real… RTK2:　カン　勧奨　かんしょう(encouragement)… 　　　　　　　　Semi-Pure Group:　歓570　観572 　(ｹﾝ): 権571.
jp_example_words:
勧誘(かんゆう): invitation, solicitation, canvassing, inducement, persuasion, encouragement
勧告(かんこく): advice, counsel, remonstrance, recommendation
勧め(すすめ): recommendation, advice, encouragement
勧める(すすめる): recommend, advise, encourage
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: There’s an arrow in that turkey and you do everything in your power to recommend that we don’t eat the turkey. There’s an arrow in this turkey. The arrow looks a little broken, so there’s probably splinters all up inside that turkey. I know you’re all hungry but I can’t recommend eating this bird.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: You can’t recommend this turkey. It’s probably dangerous. Imagine sending this turkey back in a restaurant, very upset with everything. Also keep in mind that the arrow is half buried in the turkey and looks a little broken since the arrow radical is a bit off.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You recommend the Genghis Khan (かん) special instead of this arrow-tainted turkey! When it comes out, your heart sinks. Genghis Khan apparently ate a cow with an arrow broken off in it.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Welp, I guess if Genghis Khan recommends eating food with weapons still in them, you're okay with recommending it too. Eat up, everyone.
Ru_Radicals: ノ, 力 (сила), 矢 (стрела), 隹 (старая птица)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the man (𠂉) with the one (一) little bird (隹) makes an effort (力) to persuade

勧字的基本解释

勧
quàn
古同“劝”。

勧字的汉语字典释义

[①]［quàn］
同“勸1”。
《宋元以来俗字谱》：“勸”，《白袍记》作“勧”。按，亦为“勸”的日本用简体汉字。

Name meaning

quàn
яп. вм. 劝
Radicals: 矢, 隹, 力  (arrow, turkey, power)
Meaning Mnemonic
There’s an arrow in that turkey and you do everything in your power to recommend that we don’t eat the turkey. There’s an arrow in this turkey. The arrow looks a little broken, so there’s probably splinters all up inside that turkey. I know you’re all hungry but I can’t recommend eating this bird.
You can’t recommend this turkey. It’s probably dangerous. Imagine sending this turkey back in a restaurant, very upset with everything. Also keep in mind that the arrow is half buried in the turkey and looks a little broken since the arrow radical is a bit off.
Reading Mnemonic
You recommend the Genghis Khan (かん) special instead of this arrow-tainted turkey! When it comes out, your heart sinks. Genghis Khan apparently ate a cow with an arrow broken off in it.
Welp, I guess if Genghis Khan recommends eating food with weapons still in them, you're okay with recommending it too. Eat up, everyone.
